metaDescription: Find top-rated financial advisors in Duncanville. Expert guidance for retirement planning, wealth management, and investment strategies.

Edward Jones - Financial Advisor: Vernon L Folks, CFP®|CPWA®

heroDescription: Duncanville, Texas, a vibrant community in the Dallas-Fort Worth metroplex, offers a blend of suburban charm and urban accessibility.
landscapeDescription: Duncanville has a population of 39,605 and is part of the thriving Dallas-Fort Worth metro area. The local economy is bolstered by proximity to major industries in Dallas, including technology and retail.
uniqueNeeds: Duncanville requires tailored financial advice for families and small businesses, focusing on education and healthcare sectors.
citySpecificRiskAdvice: Duncanville's reliance on retail and education poses risks; housing market volatility and flooding are concerns. Diversify investments to mitigate economic downturns.

sections.title: Economic Growth
sections.description: According to BEA (2023), Duncanville's economy is growing steadily, driven by retail and local services, contributing to overall regional growth.

sections.title: Wealth Demographics
sections.description: According to Census (2023), the median income in Duncanville is approximately $60,000, reflecting a diverse economic base.

sections.title: Advisor Specializations
sections.description: Based on BLS (2023), financial advisors in Duncanville are increasingly focusing on family wealth management and retirement planning.

sections.title: Cost of Living
sections.description: According to BLS (2024), Duncanville's cost of living is competitive, making it an attractive option for families and young professionals.

sections.title: Real Estate Market
sections.description: According to Zillow (2024), the real estate market in Duncanville shows steady appreciation, but potential bubble risks exist due to rapid price increases.

sections.title: Business Environment
sections.description: According to Fortune (2024), Duncanville's business climate is favorable, with support for small businesses and local entrepreneurship initiatives.
